bibl.title: The Origins of the Illustrated Book.
bibl.note: The only sort of account of the illustrated book's early history which will meet the facts is of a complex nature, involving several distinct and simultaneous channels of development.
bibl.seg: Horsfall Nicholas, The Origins of the Illustrated Book.
The only sort of account of the illustrated book's early history which will meet the facts is of a complex nature, involving several distinct and simultaneous channels of development.
